pageTitle: How It Works - From Kitchen to Your Table
subtitle: Our platform connects you to fresh, homemade meals through a simple, trusted process for both users and home cooks.

bullets.label: For Users
bullets.text: Sign up and provide dietary preferences, allergies, and location details.

bullets.label: For HomeCooks
bullets.text: Register, get verified, upload mandatory food licenses, and set up your menu.

bullets.label: The Match
bullets.text: Our AI matches users with a highly-rated home cook within a 2 to 10 km radius based on preferences.

bullets.label: Choose Your Plan
bullets.text: Users select from Daily, Weekly, or Monthly flexible subscription plans.

bullets.label: Order Processing
bullets.text: Home cooks receive the order and prepare meals according to their selected weekly menus and user preferences.

bullets.label: Quality Control
bullets.text: Regular inspections and surprise checks ensure adherence to food safety and hygiene standards.

bullets.label: Receive Your Meal
bullets.text: Users can opt for home delivery or choose self-pickup/drop-off for added flexibility.

bullets.label: Real-Time Tracking
bullets.text: Transparency is ensured with real-time order tracking.

bullets.label: Improvement Cycle
bullets.text: Users provide ratings and reviews on meal quality and service, helping home cooks refine their offerings and track performance.
